did.abstract: Manuscript reports, correspondence, photographs, clippings, and related printed matter concerning the University Elementary School, University of California, Los Angeles.
did.physloc: Stored off-site at SRLF. Advance notice is required for access to the collection. Please contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Reproduction
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical object belong to the UCLA Library Special Collections. Literary rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

acqinfo.head: Provenance/Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Corinne Aldine Seeds, August, 1962.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Corinne A. Seeds Papers (Collection 838). Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, UCLA.

bioghist.head: Biography/History
bioghist.p: Seeds was born in 1889; in 1925, she became principal of the Training School of the the fledgling University of California, Southern Branch, located on North Vermont Ave. in Los Angeles; in 1929, Seeds and the Training School moved to its first Westwood location on Warner Ave., and the school was renamed the University Elementary School (UES); in the late 1940s the school moved to the UCLA campus, and the first permanent UES buildings opened in 1950; Seeds retired as principal of UES in 1957; she died in 1969; in 1982, the school was renamed the Corinne A. Seeds University Elementary School in her honor.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p:
The following oral history is available through the UCLA Library Center for Oral History Research:
Corinne Aldine Seeds

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of manuscript reports, correspondence, photographs, clippings, and printed material related to the career of Corinne A. Seeds and the University Elementary School at UCLA.

controlaccess.subject: University of California, Los Angeles. University Elementary School.

did.unittitle: Manuscript reports, correspondence, photographs, clippings, and related printed matter concerning the University Elementary School, University of California, Los Angeles.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A transcript of a tape recorded interview with Corinne Aldine Seeds, UES; the history of the creative elementary school, 300/7, supplements the papers.
